question: ‘Formation and Promotion of 10,000’, which was making news recently, belongs to which category of scheme?
explanation:
As per the Ministry of Agriculture, a new Central Sector Scheme titled ‘Formation and Promotion of 10,000 Farmer Produce Organizations (FPOs)’ has been launched.
The budgetary provision for the scheme is Rs 6,865 crore. The FPOs will be provided financial assistance of up to Rs 18 lakh per organisation for a period of three years.
